Html:
How can I get the gmap.net.dll?

I tried to download the latest source code--greatmaps-46320 and compiled it.

But I cannot found gmap.net.dll.

I know that I need to add the dll to the project, is it right?

Sorry, I still cannot find it.

I use Visual C# 2008 Express to open GMap.NET.sln.

Then it prompts the below error:

"Solution folders are not supported in this version of the application.

Solution folder 'GMap.NET' will be displayed as unavailable"

So, even I compile the whole solution, I cannot find gmap.net.dll in Build folder.

It only contains of GMap.NET.Core.dll, GMap.NET.WindowsPresentation.dll, System.Data.SQLite.dll.

Sorry.
so why do use crappy express version?
